Introduction: Oh, hey! You're that new farmer!#$e#Welcome to Pelican Town!
spring_Thu: Have you met my sister Ana?#$b#She's pretty passionate about everything.#$b#But I think that's why everyone likes her so much.
fall_Wed: My brother Jake is pretty nerdy.#$b#I usually think myself as being pretty nerdy,#$b#But Jake? He takes the cake.
winter_Tue: I friggin' love my wife.#$b#She's just the best, man.
